name: Grandfathered In
description:
MADE FOR THE BIG AWFUL JAM 2016

http://www.awfuljams.com

In the grand tradition of Princess Maker and Long Live the Queen, Grandfathered In (working title Princess Grandpa) asks players to sculpt the learning experience of a humble grandfather as he moves towards the most important test of his life.

THRILL to the 12 branching scenes that play out differently based on your (yes, YOUR) training decisions!

SWOON at the customizability offered by the wardrobe selection, featuring at least 2 (two) outfits!

DELIGHT at the full-color artwork and Creative Commons music!

  • "Exciting," menu-based "gameplay!"
  • Inconsistent tone!
  • Six different endings!
  • World's first emergent Grandpa-driven MMORPG experience!

Experience the game JonTerp described as possibly

TOO HOT FOR TWITCH STREAMING

because of

GRANDPA'S NAKED PENIS!
